name: Inception
description: It follows Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who extracts information from people's dreams. Instead of stealing, he's hired to perform inception
summary: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief [...] But no amount of careful planning or expertise can prepare the team for the dangerous enemy that seems to predict their every move.

name: Interstellar
description: A 2014 science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan, focusing on a near-future Earth where humanity faces extinction due to blight and resource depletion.
summary: Set in a dystopian future, a team of astronauts travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for mankind.

name: The Dark Knight
description: follows Batman (Christian Bale) as he confronts the Joker (Heath Ledger), a chaotic criminal mastermind who threatens Gotham City.
summary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

name: The Matrix
description: A simulated reality—a computer-generated world designed to keep humans pacified while their bodies are used as an energy source by machines.
summary: A hacker discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulated world and joins a rebellion against its machine overlords.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A 1994 American drama film about a banker, Andy Dufresne, who is wrongly convicted of murdering his wife and her lover and sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary.
summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Released in 1994, that chronicled 30 years (from the 1950s through the early 1980s) of the life of an intellectually disabled man (played by Tom Hanks) in an unlikely fable that earned critical praise.
summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

name: The Godfather
description: The film follows the Corleone family, a powerful Italian-American mafia family, and their rise and struggles within the criminal underworld of New York City.
summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: A crime film directed by Quentin Tarantino, intertwining multiple stories of criminals in Los Angeles.
summary: Interwoven stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles, featuring hitmen, a boxer, a gangster’s wife, and more.

name: Fight Club
description: A psychological drama about an insomniac office worker who forms an underground fight club.
summary: An insomniac forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, spiraling into chaos and identity destruction.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The first part of the epic fantasy trilogy, following a hobbit's quest to destroy a powerful ring.
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring.

name: Gladiator
description: A Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and his family murdered.
summary: Maximus, a Roman general turned slave and gladiator, rises through the arena to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee seeks help from an imprisoned cannibal to catch another serial killer.
summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated cannibal killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.

name: Titanic
description: A romantic drama set against the tragic sinking of the RMS Titanic.
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

name: Saving Private Ryan
description: A World War II epic about a mission to save a paratrooper behind enemy lines.
summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to find and bring home a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
